long_description: The Armpocket Aero i-10 Armband securely holds your phone or MP3 player while training, and it offers 2 pockets to stow your small essentials. Ergonomic design with nonslip memory foam molds to your arm for an optimal fit; moisture-wicking strap and back help ensure comfort while you work out. Touch-sensitive window lets you use your smartphone or MP3 player while it's in the armband. 2 storage pockets fit your keys, energy gel packs, credit cards and ID, making this armband a great choice for marathon training, hiking and other fitness activities. The Armpocket Aero i-10 Armband fits the iPhone(R) 5 and other phones or devices up to 5 in. Small fits arms with a circumference of 7 - 11 in.; Medium fits arms with a circumference of 10 - 14 in. Machine washable; air dry.
short_description: The Armpocket Aero i-10 Armband securely holds your phone or MP3 player while training, and it offers 2 pockets to stow your small essentials.
